notes: content_markdown preserves bullets (● ○ ■) and headings as extracted from the PDF.
Weekly Quran recitations are included as weekly recurrence rules within Ramadan (Thursday night, Friday morning).
Daily recurring items (every day/night/sehri/iftar/general) are marked with freq=daily within Ramadan.

items.label: Thursday night — Quran recitation
items.text:
● (1) Surah al-Isra’ (Bani-Isra'il; No. 17),
■ will join Imam al-Mahdi
● (2) Surah al-Kahf (No. 18),
■ will die as martyr and will be resurrected with and in the line of the martyrs (on the Resurrection Day).
● (3) the three Surahs beginning with Ta-Sin,
■ i.e. Surah al-Shu`ara' (No. 26), Surah al-Naml (No. 27), and Surah al-Qasas (No. 28),
■ will be included with the intimate saints of Almighty Allah, will be made in the vicinity and under the protection of Him, will never be inflicted with misery in his worldly life, and will be given beyond his pleasure on the Resurrection Day.
● (4) Surah al-Sajdah (No. 32),
■ will be given his Record of Deeds in his right hand, will not be interrogated about his evildoings, and will be included with the companions of Muhammad and his Household—peace be upon them all.
● (5) Surah Yasin (No. 36),
● (6) Surah Sad (No. 38),
● (7) Surah al-Ahqaf (No. 46),
■ will be saved, by Almighty Allah, from terrors in the worldly life and will be secured from the horror of the Resurrection Day.
● (8) Surah al-Waqi`ah (No. 56),
■ will be loved by Almighty Allah, all people will be made to love him, will be saved from all miseries, poverty, neediness, and misfortunes in this worldly life, and will be joined to the companions of Imam `Ali Amir al-Mu'minin (as) because this Surah is ascribed to him
● (9) Surah Fussilat (No. 41),
● (10) Surah al-Dukhan (No. 44),
● (11) Surah al-Tur (No. 52),
● (12) Surah al-Qamar (No. 54),
● (13) Surah al-Jumu`ah (No. 62).

● If there is not enough time to recite all these Surahs, one may choose Surah al-Waqi`ah and those preceding it [in the aforesaid list].

amaal_bullets.text: will die as martyr and will be resurrected with and in the line of the martyrs (on the Resurrection Day).
(3) the three Surahs beginning with Ta-Sin,
i.e. Surah al-Shu`ara' (No. 26), Surah al-Naml (No. 27), and Surah al-Qasas (No. 28),

will be included with the intimate saints of Almighty Allah, will be made in the vicinity and under the protection of Him, will never be inflicted with misery in his worldly life, and will be given beyond his pleasure on the Resurrection Day.
will be given his Record of Deeds in his right hand, will not be interrogated about his evildoings, and will be included with the companions of Muhammad and his Household—peace be upon them all.
will be saved, by Almighty Allah, from terrors in the worldly life and will be secured from the horror of the Resurrection Day.

will be loved by Almighty Allah, all people will be made to love him, will be saved from all miseries, poverty, neediness, and misfortunes in this worldly life, and will be joined to the companions of Imam `Ali Amir al-Mu'minin (as) because this Surah is ascribed to him
If there is not enough time to recite all these Surahs, one may choose Surah al-Waqi`ah and those preceding it [in the aforesaid list].

items.label: Friday morning — Quran recitation
items.text:
● After fajr salat recite Sura Fatiha & Sura Tauheed once & then Sura Falaq & Sura Naas 7 times each
● (7) Surah al-Ahqaf (No. 46),
■ will be saved, by Almighty Allah, from terrors in the worldly life and will be secured from the horror of the Resurrection Day.
● Surahs al-Nisa' (No. 4)
● Surah Hud (No. 11)
● al-Kahf (No.18)
● al-Saffat (No. 37)
● al-Rahman (No. 55
● Surah al-Mu'minun (No. 23)
● Ghusl Dua

amaal_bullets.text: After fajr salat recite Sura Fatiha & Sura Tauheed once & then Sura Falaq & Sura Naas 7 times each
will be saved, by Almighty Allah, from terrors in the worldly life and will be secured from the horror of the Resurrection Day.

items.label: General — Ramadan amaal
items.text:
● Fast whole month for the love of allah and seeking to attain nearness to allah
● Make much Dua/hajaat

Recitations:
● Read the Quran day and night
○ give reward to imams as your reward will be twofold and will be raised in their company on DOJ
● Recite surah Qadr x1,000 every night
● Recite surah Dukhan x100 every night

Dhikr:
● Ask for forgiveness (istighfar)
● Takbir
● Recite ‘la ilaha illalah’
● Dhikr X 100 (MJ: Pg 565)
● Salawat X100 or more

Supplications:
● Supplication after every wajib prayer - (MJ:Pg 469)
● Supplication after every wajib prayer to rid sins - (MJ:Pg 470)
● Short supplication that pardons sins of 40 years daily - (MJ: Pg 565)
● After every nafila prayer recite Dua on (MJ:Pg 489)
● Every day recite at all times - (MJ: Pg 564)

Prayers:
● Do nafila prayers
● Offer x1000 rakaat
○ First 20 days - 20 rakat as 10 prayers
■ 4 prayers after maghrib + 6 prayers after isha
■ Makes 400 rakat
○ Last 10 days - 30 rakat as 15 prayers
■ 4 prayers after maghrib + 11 prayers after isha
■ Makes 300 rakat
○ 3 laylatul Qadr nights - 100 rakat each
■ makes 300 rakat

intro_bullets.text: Fast whole month for the love of allah and seeking to attain nearness to allah

recitations_bullets.text: Read the Quran day and night
give reward to imams as your reward will be twofold and will be raised in their company on DOJ
Recite surah Qadr x1,000 every night
Recite surah Dukhan x100 every night

Short supplication that pardons sins of 40 years daily - (MJ: Pg 565)
After every nafila prayer recite Dua on (MJ:Pg 489)
Every day recite at all times - (MJ: Pg 564)

prayers_bullets.text: 4 prayers after maghrib + 6 prayers after isha
4 prayers after maghrib + 11 prayers after isha

items.label: Every night
items.text:
Supplications:
● Supplication of hajj after every maghrib prayer (mustahabb during the day also) - (MJ:Pg 471)
● Supplication every night to rid sins - (MJ:Pg 476)
● Dua Iftitah - (MJ:Pg 477)
● Supplication every night - (MJ:Pg 485)

Prayers:
● Prayer that rids 70,000 sins
○ 2 rakat prayer
■ In each rakat recite:
● Fatiha X1
● Tawheed X3
■ After completing prayer, say Dua + fourfold tasbihat 7 times on (MJ: Pg 488) + X10 salawat
● When praying nafila prayers, if surah Fath is recited - one will remain secure throughout the year

supplications_bullets.text: Supplication of hajj after every maghrib prayer (mustahabb during the day also) - (MJ:Pg 471)
Supplication every night to rid sins - (MJ:Pg 476)

prayers_bullets.text: After completing prayer, say Dua + fourfold tasbihat 7 times on (MJ: Pg 488) + X10 salawat
When praying nafila prayers, if surah Fath is recited - one will remain secure throughout the year

items.label: Every day
items.text:
Supplications:
● Long Dua (MJ: Pg 533 - 544)
● Long 10 passage Dua starting with Subhallah (MJ: Pg 544 - 552)
● Dua (MJ: Pg 553 - 559)
● Dua (MJ: Pg 559 - 564)

supplications_bullets.text: Long 10 passage Dua starting with Subhallah (MJ: Pg 544 - 552)

items.label: Sehri time
items.text:
● Recite surah Qadr
○ Reciting surah before eating sehri and before breaking fast at iftar time - You get the reward of a martyr who had shed his blood in Allah’s way
● When you eat sehri, ask for forgiveness - allah will forgive
● Better not to miss sehri
○ Eating dates at sehri is recommended
● Recite Dua al-sahar (MJ: Pg 490) and (MJ: Pg 524)
● Recite Dua Abu-Hamzah At-Thumali (MJ: Pg 493)

amaal_bullets.text: Reciting surah before eating sehri and before breaking fast at iftar time - You get the reward of a martyr who had shed his blood in Allah’s way
When you eat sehri, ask for forgiveness - allah will forgive
Eating dates at sehri is recommended
Recite Dua al-sahar (MJ: Pg 490) and (MJ: Pg 524)

items.label: Breaking fast
items.text:
**Before breaking fast:**

اللَّهُمَّ لَكَ صُمْتُ، وَعَلَىٰ رِزْقِكَ أَفْطَرْتُ، وَعَلَيْكَ تَوَكَّلْتُ

*O Allah, I have fasted for You, and I open my fast with the food provided by You, and I put my trust in You.*

---

بِسْمِ اللَّهِ، اللَّهُمَّ لَكَ صُمْنَا، وَعَلَىٰ رِزْقِكَ أَفْطَرْنَا، فَتَقَبَّلْ مِنَّا، إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ

*In the Name of Allah. O Allah, we have fasted for You, and we open it with the food provided by You. Accept it from us. Indeed, You are the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.*

---

● Recite Surah al-Qadr
● Give charity
● Offer food to one who is fasting


**With the first morsel in the mouth:**

بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
يَا وَاسِعَ الْمَغْفِرَةِ، اغْفِرْ لِي

*In the Name of Allah, the All-Beneficent, the All-Merciful. O You who are vast in forgiveness, forgive me.*

context_lines: اللَّهُمَّ لَكَ صُمْتُ، وَعَلَىٰ رِزْقِكَ أَفْطَرْتُ، وَعَلَيْكَ تَوَكَّلْتُ
O Allah, I have fasted for You, and I open my fast with the food provided by You, and I put my trust in You.
بِسْمِ اللَّهِ، اللَّهُمَّ لَكَ صُمْنَا، وَعَلَىٰ رِزْقِكَ أَفْطَرْنَا، فَتَقَبَّلْ مِنَّا، إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ
In the Name of Allah. O Allah, we have fasted for You, and we open it with the food provided by You. Accept it from us. Indeed, You are the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.
sections.amaal_heading: With the first morsel in the mouth

amaal_bullets.text: Offer food to one who is fasting

بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
يَا وَاسِعَ الْمَغْفِرَةِ، اغْفِرْ لِي

In the Name of Allah, the All-Beneficent, the All-Merciful. O You who are vast in forgiveness, forgive me.

items.label: 1st night
items.text:
General:
● Spend time with spouse
● Ghusl to remain secure from scabies until next Ramadan
● Perform Ziyarah in Karbala at Imam Hussain’s shrine

Prayers:
● 4 rakat prayer as 2 prayers
○ In each rakat recite:
■ Fatiha X1
■ Tawheed X15
● 2 rakat prayer
○ In each rakat recite:
■ Fatiha X1
■ Anaam X1
○ Ask Allah to suffice and preserve one from every anxiety and pain until the end of the month

Supplications:
● Dua Jawshan Kabeer
● Dua (MJ:Pg 459)
● Dua after Maghrib with hands raised - (MJ:Pg 571)
● 44th Supplication of Sahifat Kamilah
● 2 Supplications (MJ:Pg 575)
● Supplication of Hajj after Maghrib prayer - (MJ:Pg 471)

general_bullets.text: Ghusl to remain secure from scabies until next Ramadan

prayers_bullets.text: Ask Allah to suffice and preserve one from every anxiety and pain until the end of the month

supplications_bullets.text: Dua after Maghrib with hands raised - (MJ:Pg 571)

items.text:
Supplications:

● To be protected from calamities that may befall during the year - (MJ:Pg 579)

● 2 rakat prayer
○ In first rakat recite:
■ Fatiha X1
■ Fath X10
○ In second rakat recite:
■ Fatiha X1
■ Any surah X1
○ All evils kept away during the entire year

● Salawāt is to be said 50 times after the prayers

○ In each rakat recite:
■ Fatiha X1
■ Yaseen X1, Mulk X1, Tawheed X1 (in this order after Fatiha)

○ In each rakat recite:

■ Zalzalah X30
● 4 rakat prayer as 2 prayers
○ In each rakat recite:
■ Fatiha X1
■ Yaseen X1, Mulk X1, Tawheed X1 (in this order after Fatiha)

items.label: 15th night
items.text:
General:
● Perform bath
● Perform Ziyarah of Imam Hussain

Prayers:
● 4 rakat prayer as 2 prayers
○ In first 2 rakat recite:
■ Fatiha X1
■ Tawheed X100
○ In last 2 rakat recite:
■ Fatiha X1
■ Tawheed X50

● 6 rakat prayer as 3 prayers
○ In each rakat recite:
■ Fatiha X1
■ Yaseen X1, Mulk X1, Tawheed X1 (in this order after Fatiha)

● 100 rakat prayer as 50 prayers
○ In each rakat recite:
■ Fatiha X1
■ Tawheed X30
○ Allah sends down 10 angels to guard against enemies from humans and jinn

● At Imam Hussain's shrine next to the tomb:
○ 10 rakat prayer as 5 prayers
■ Invoke Allah’s protection from hellfire
■ They will be delivered from the hellfire and leave the world with the good news of Paradise

items.label: 17th night - Battle of Badr
items.text:
● 2 rakat prayer
○ in first rakat recite;
■ Fatiha X1
■ any surah X1
○ in second rakat;
■ Fatiha X1
■ Tawheed X100
○ Lã ilaha illallah to be said 100 times after the salam.
● Give sadaqah and thank Allah
○ Messenger of allah faced troops of infedels of Quraysh. battle of Badr took place the following day
● perform bath and engage in worship

items.text: ● Supplication - (MJ:Pg 628)

items.label: Common Laylatul Qadr amaal
items.text:
General:
● All affairs of the year are ordained on this night
● Angels descend upon the earth and are presented to Imam Mahdi
● All matters pertaining to each person are informed to Imam Mahdi
● Sayeda Fatima used to advise her family to sleep and rest during the day to remain vigilant all night
● Stay vigilant all night as sins are forgiven
● Perform bath
○ Preferably near sunset so the evening prayer is performed in the state of ghusl

Prayers:
● 2 rakat prayer
○ In each rakat recite:
■ Fatiha X1
■ Tawheed X7
○ After prayer recite: Astaghfirullah wa atubu ilayh

● Place the Quran on the head and recite the Dua (MJ:Pg 590)

Supplications:
● Perform Ziyarah of Imam Hussain
● Recite Dua (MJ:Pg 591)
● Dua Jawshan Kabeer

general_bullets.text: All affairs of the year are ordained on this night
Angels descend upon the earth and are presented to Imam Mahdi
All matters pertaining to each person are informed to Imam Mahdi
Sayeda Fatima used to advise her family to sleep and rest during the day to remain vigilant all night
Stay vigilant all night as sins are forgiven
Preferably near sunset so the evening prayer is performed in the state of ghusl

items.label: 19th night
items.text:
Dhikr:
● Astaghfirullah Rabbi wa atubu ilayh X100
● Allahumma la‘n qatalata Amir al-Mu’mineen X100
● Recite abundant Salawat as this is the night Imam Ali was martyred

Supplications:
● Recite (MJ:Pg 564) and make your hajaat

Prayers:
● 50 rakat prayer as 25 prayers
○ In each rakat recite:
■ Fatiha X1
■ Zalzalah X1
○ Note: What is meant is that Surat al-Zalzalah is recited once in each rakat, as it would be difficult to recite it 2500 times in one night

● 2 rakat prayer
○ In first rakat recite:
■ Fatiha X1
■ Tawheed X1
○ In second rakat recite:
■ Fatiha X1
■ Qadr X1
○ Then perform Tasbih
○ Glorify Allah
○ Pray for all believers
○ Perform a long prostration with hajaat

dhikr_bullets.text: Astaghfirullah Rabbi wa atubu ilayh X100
Allahumma la‘n qatalata Amir al-Mu’mineen X100
Recite abundant Salawat as this is the night Imam Ali was martyred

prayers_bullets.text: Note: Surat al-Zalzalah is recited once in each rakat
Perform a long prostration with hajaat

items.label: 19th day
items.text: ● Supplication - (MJ:Pg 628)

items.label: Last 10 days of Ramadan
items.text: ● Recite Dua Faraj MANY times

items.label: Last 10 nights
items.text:
● Mustahab to take a bath on each of these nights
● Do ihtikaf for devotions

amaal_bullets.text: Mustahab to take a bath on each of these nights

items.label: 20th night
items.text:
● 8 rakat prayer as 4 prayers
○ in each rakat recite;
■ Fatiha X1
■ any surah X1

items.label: 20th day
items.text: ● Supplication - (MJ:Pg 629)

items.label: 21st night
items.text:
General:
● Spend the night discussing matters related to religion

Prayers:
● 8 rakat prayer as 4 prayers
○ In each rakat recite:
■ Fatiha X1
■ Any surah X1

Supplications:
● Dua (MJ:Pg 595)

general_bullets.text: Spend the night discussing matters related to religion

items.label: 21st day - Martyrdom of imam ali
items.text:
● Martyrdom of imam ali
● Supplication - (MJ:Pg 629)
● Perform ziyarah of Imam Ali

items.label: 22nd night
items.text:
● 8 rakat prayer as 4 prayers
○ in each rakat recite;
■ Fatiha X1
■ any surah X1

items.label: 22nd day
items.text: ● Supplication - (MJ:Pg 629)

items.label: 23rd night
items.text:
● All days after this night are equal to Laylatul Qadr

Quran recitations:
● Recite surah Ankabut and Rum - will be among people of paradise
● Surah Dukhan
● Surah Qadr X1000 times

Supplications:
● Ziyarah of Imam Hussain
● Dua on Pg 298
● Duas on Pg 599
● Duas + make hajat on Pg 599
● Recite Dua Tawba
● Recite daa Makrim al Akhlaq
● Recite supplications of sahifa al kamilah

Prayers:
● 100 rakat prayer as 50 prayers
○ in each rakat recite;
■ Fatiha X1
■ Tawheed X10
● 8 rakat prayer as 4 prayers
○ in each rakat recite;
■ Fatiha X1
■ any surah X1

context_lines: General: All days after this night are equal to Laylatul Qadr
Quran recitations: Recite surah Ankabut and Rum - will be among people of paradise
Quran recitations: Surah Qadr X1000 times
Supplications: Duas + make hajat on Pg 599
Supplications: Recite daa Makrim al Akhlaq
Supplications: Recite supplications of sahifa al kamilah

items.label: 23rd day
items.text: ● Supplication - (MJ:Pg 629)

items.label: 24th night
items.text:
● 8 rakat prayer as 4 prayers
○ in each rakat recite;
■ Fatiha X1
■ any surah X1

items.label: 24th day
items.text: ● Supplication - (MJ:Pg 630)

items.label: 25th night
items.text:
● 8 rakat prayer as 4 prayers
○ in each rakat recite;
■ Fatiha X1
■ Tawheed X10

items.label: 25th day
items.text: ● Supplication - (MJ:Pg 630)

items.label: 26th night
items.text:
● 8 rakat prayer as 4 prayers
○ in each rakat recite;
■ Fatiha X1
■ Tawheed X100

items.label: 26th day
items.text: ● Supplication - (MJ:Pg 630)

items.label: 27th night
items.text:
Supplications:
● Dua (MJ:Pg 602)

Prayers:
● 4 rakat prayer as 2 prayers
○ In each rakat recite:
■ Fatiha X1
■ Surah Mulk X1 OR Tawheed X20

prayers_bullets.text: Surah Mulk X1 OR Tawheed X20

items.label: 27th day
items.text: ● Supplication - (MJ:Pg 630)

items.label: 28th night
items.text:
● 6 rakat prayer as 3 prayers
○ in each rakat recite;
■ Fatiha X1
■ ayat al-Kursi, al-Tawhid and al-Kawthar X100 in this order after Fatiha
○ Salawāt to be said X100 times after the prayers

○ The compiler says: According to what I have found, the prayer for the 28th night is six rakahs with each of Ayat al-Kursi, Sürat a-Kawthar and al-Tawhid recited 10 times after al-Fatihah in each rakah. Then salawat (Allahumma salli alà Muhammadi"w wa ali Muham-mad) is to be said 100 times after the prayers.

amaal_bullets.text: ayat al-Kursi, al-Tawhid and al-Kawthar X100 in this order after Fatiha
Salawāt to be said X100 times after the prayers

The compiler says: According to what I have found, the prayer for the 28th night is six rakahs with each of Ayat al-Kursi, Sürat a-Kawthar and al-Tawhid recited 10 times after al-Fatihah in each rakah. Then salawat (Allahumma salli alà Muhammadi"w wa ali Muham-mad) is to be said 100 times after the prayers.

items.label: 28th day
items.text: ● Supplication - (MJ:Pg 631)

items.label: 29th night
items.text:
● 2 rakat prayer
○ in each rakat recite;
■ Fatiha X1
■ Tawheed X20
● Do 30th night amaal too (incase this is last night of Ramadan)

amaal_bullets.text: Do 30th night amaal too (incase this is last night of Ramadan)

items.label: 29th day
items.text: ● Supplication - (MJ:Pg 631)

items.label: 30th night / last night of Ramadan
items.text:
General:
● Perform bath

Prayers:
● 12 rakat prayer as 6 prayers
○ In each rakat recite:
■ Fatiha X1
■ Tawheed X20
○ Recite Salawat X100 after completing the prayers

Recitations:
● Perform Ziyarah of Imam Hussain
● Recite Surah Anaam, Surah Kahf, and Surah Yaseen
● Recite Astaghfirullah wa atubu ilayh X100
● Dua (MJ:Pg 602)
● Dua (MJ:Pg 613) under section (3)
● Farewell supplication (MJ:Pg 632)
● 2 Duas (MJ:Pg 603)

prayers_bullets.text: Recite Salawat X100 after completing the prayers

recitations_bullets.text: Recite Surah Anaam, Surah Kahf, and Surah Yaseen
Recite Astaghfirullah wa atubu ilayh X100

items.label: 30th day
items.text: ● Supplication - (MJ:Pg 631)
